stable.body:
• Shizuku support
• Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
• New map list with searching and sorting options
• Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
• Show thumbnail of chosen map
• Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
• Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
• Various UI improvements
• Various bug fixes
• Monochrome icon
stable.bodyMarkdown:
## Features
- automatically detect Files app restrictions [#49](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/49) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/5dee938e931da5105e7f4bef407e6157decd7457))
- **ui**: minor improvements [#49](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/49) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/a6e11f5d116a90df324042ea65212426e75f5643))
- **l10n**: update translations [#47](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/47) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/632bf65a2cfcbbe3907b8e1639f9e152b0f34977))

## Bug Fixes
- get device language correctly [#49](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/49) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/c63a0c54b3f7603c1c5813ca2d781ec2c54150df))

## Chores
- update dependencies [#49](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/49) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/75d1cbbc6a4123b53a1256405d8487ce9fd0e603))
- update app version to `v1.7.1` (17100) [#49](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/49) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/12d388fcdaa3915134a2a0b4c3fb93d5da45f5d7))

preRelease.body:
• Shizuku support
• Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
• New map list with searching and sorting options
• Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
• Show thumbnail of chosen map
• Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
• Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
• Various UI improvements
• Various bug fixes
• Monochrome icon
